About Me



WHO I AM:

Ever since I was a kid I’ve always had an interest in technology. Just looking at an IC or a motherboard amused me, to think of “who is the mastermind who designed what seems to be a microscopic city where everything is placed in the right order” I had to know how it worked, and so it started out as just a hobby.

I’ve been coding since 2018 in different languages such as C, C++, Java, HTML and CSS, just because it was fun to know. However it wasn’t until January 2020 when I decided to start my own path into becoming a full stack web developer, I knew I had a lot to learn at the time, but the more I learned the more I realised how much I don’t know, and the desire to know more grew with every line of code I wrote. Today I use JavaScript, node.js, and react on a daily basis, but I know I have a long way to go, a lot of problems to solve, and a lot of ideas to execute. as Jeff Delaney from fireship.io said: “ideas are cheap, execution is everything”. My name is Abd al Qader, and I’m a self taught web developer.

EXPERIENCE

What im good at:
  • HTML, CSS,
  • JavaScript
  • Node.JS
  • React
  • MongoDB
Limited experience:
  • C, C++
  • Java
  • Networking
Like i said... my journey is not done yet, i am currently learning AWS to take on the Solutions Architect exam.
